allOf.description:
Credit account to inquire transactions for. If
specified, only transactions on this account will be returned.

Credit card to inquire transactions for. Not
required in case the account is specified. If specified and the
account is not, the search level will determine which account
transactions will be returned

Search level identifying which transactions
should be returned

Search filter to apply if any. If not specified,
no filter will be applied and all card/account transactions will
be returned

Specifies the order in which the transactions
should be returned. In case not specified, date local desc is used
by default

Range for the date local to get the transactions
for. The date local is the date on which the transaction occurred
in the acquiring country

Range for the transmission date to get the
transactions for. The date transmission is the date on which the
transaction was actually transmitted from the acquirer to the
issuer

Range for the transmission time to get the
transactions for. The time transmission is the time on which the
transaction was actually transmitted from the acquirer to the
issuer

Range for the transaction date transactions for.
The transaction date is the date time on which the transaction was
actually received by the issuer in the issuer's local time

Posing date range to get the transactions for.
The posting date is the date was actually posted on the account
and affected the balance

TlogId.description:
Cortex transaction log ID identifying the
financial transaction that generated this credit transaction. Only
available in case the transaction is an actual financial
transaction (Purchase/Cash Withdrawal...). Not available for
payments and adjustments

allOf.description:
Amount range for the transaction amount in the
transaction currency - not necessarily that of the account

List of transaction currencies to get the
transactions for

Amount range for the billing amount in the
account currency - the actual posted amount

List of billing currencies to get the
transactions for

List of cortex transaction code to get the
transactions for. Identifies the type of
transaction. Only valid in
case the credit transaction is a
financial one. To get the list of
supported values, please use the
GetNumericDescription service with
description type as 'tx'

List of cortex transaction code to exclude from
the search.

List of transaction statuses to get the
transactions for. Identifies the status of the transaction. A
predefined list of values exist of which the below indicate that
the transaction is not suspended (posted or eligible to be
posted):
- 0 - not suspended
- 101 - force posted
To get the list of
supported values and descriptions, please use the
GetNumericDescription service with description type as "ccsist"

List of transaction statuses to exclude from the
search.

Stan.description: Stan of the transaction to inquire

Rrn.description:
Reference of the transaction to get the details
for

allOf.description:
List of message class entries to include in the
search

List of message class entries to exclude from the
search

ItemId.description:
Unique id identifying the credit transaction in
Cortex

allOf.description: List of item types to include in the search
List of item types to exclude from the search
List of item categories to include in the search

List of item categories to exclude from the
search

PostedFlag.description:
Specifies if only posted transactions or not are
required. If not specified, both posted and pending transactions
are returned

allOf.description:
Flag to specify if credit/debit or un-posted
transactions are required

List of card acceptor IDs to include in the
search

List of card acceptor IDs to exclude from the
search

List of acquirer identifier to search for
transactions for

List of acquirer identifiers to skip from the
search
List of MCCs to include in the search
List of MCCs to exclude from the search

Page details with the results returned. Returned
in case the page setup in the request does not specify to skip the
count
List of transactions in case any
Basic Details of the transaction
Additional transaction details

ApprovalCode.description: Approval code of the transaction if any

CardAcceptorName.description:
Card acceptor name or ATM location; first part of
the card acceptor
location field (DE#043) MasterCard uses only 22
Characters.
Not available for all transactions

CardAcceptorCity.description:
City of card acceptor; second part of the card
acceptor location field (DE#043)
Not available for all transactions

sch1_CurrencyType.title: sch1_CurrencyType

CurrCode.description: Numeric ISO code identifying the currency

AlphaCode.description: ISO Alpha Code identifying the currency

sch1_CurrencyType.description:
Identifier for a currency. Can be either the ISO
numeric code or ISO Alpha Code

sch2_ActionCode.title: sch2_ActionCode
sch2_ActionCode.description:
Action code identifying the result of a
transaction.

sch2_YesNoFlag.title: sch2_YesNoFlag
sch2_YesNoFlag.description:
Flag indicating if a specific option is enabled or
disabled

sch2_Money.title: sch2_Money

allOf.description: Currency of the amount

sch2_Money.description:
Any amounts used in the webservices use the money
type which is the combination of the amount and currency. To get the
list of supported ISO currency codes, use the GetCurrencyList
service

sch2_MoneyOptionalAmount.title: sch2_MoneyOptionalAmount

allOf.description: Currency of the amount

sch2_MoneyOptionalAmount.description:
Same as money but with the amount as optional. Used
in cases where the currency is required but the amount is optional

sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList.title: sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList
sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList.description:
List of Locale descriptions defined cortex for a
specific element

sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType.title: sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType
sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType.description:
Locale description having the defined cortex
locale, description and short description

sch2_DescriptionList.title: sch2_DescriptionList
sch2_DescriptionList.description:
List of all description values available for a
specific entity

sch2_PageSetupType.title: sch2_PageSetupType

PageSize.description: Number of results supported in a single page

PageNumber.description:
The requested page number starting with 1 for the
first page. If not specified, it will be defaulted to 1

ReturnCount.description:
Specifies if the count and page details are
required in the response. If set to true, the PagingDetails tag
will be returned in the response holding the total number of
results, current number of results in the requested page, current
page number and total page number. If not specified, defaults to
true. This tag is introduced to enhance performance and response
time in case the total count is not really required

sch2_PageSetupType.description:
Page setup required (number of records per page and
the page number required)

sch2_PagingDetailsType.title: sch2_PagingDetailsType

PageSize.description:
Number of results supported in a single page.
Echoed back from the request

TotalNumberOfResults.description: Total number of results for the request

CurrentNumberOfResults.description:
Current of number of results returned in the
response

TotalNumberOfPages.description:
Total number of pages for the all results
satisfying the critieria of the request

CurrentPageNumber.description: Current page number for the results

sch2_PagingDetailsType.description: Details of the paging returned in the response

sch2_TransactionTypeListType.title: sch2_TransactionTypeListType

TransactionType.description:
Start tag for the list of individual denied
transaction types

sch2_TransactionTypeListType.description:
A list of services (transaction types) defined and
used in Cortex

sch2_BatchClassType.title: sch2_BatchClassType
sch2_BatchClassType.description:
Value indicating if a card batch is instant or
bulk...

sch2_AccountDerivationMethod.title: sch2_AccountDerivationMethod
sch2_AccountDerivationMethod.description:
Used for requests where the account is not
specified but the card is and the processing requires an account to
be selected. It defines how the account will be selected based on
the card specified

sch2_AmountRangeType.title: sch2_AmountRangeType

AmountFrom.description: Lower amount value for the range

AmountTo.description: Higher amount value for the range

sch2_AmountRangeType.description:
Range of amount (low/high) mainly used for inquiry
services. Both amount from and to can be specified or only one of
them.

sch2_CreditTransactionAction.title: sch2_CreditTransactionAction
sch2_CreditTransactionAction.description:
Action for a new credit transaction. Defaulted to C
- Create only if not specified

sch2_MessageClassType.title: sch2_MessageClassType
sch2_MessageClassType.description:
Identifies if the transaction is an authorization
transaction, financial, reversal..

sch2_DateRangeType.title: sch2_DateRangeType

DateFrom.description: From date value for the range

DateTo.description: to date value for the range

sch2_DateRangeType.description:
Range of dates mainly used for inquiry
services.
Both dates from and to can be specified or only one of
them.
(depending on the service)

sch2_TimeRangeType.title: sch2_TimeRangeType

TimeFrom.description: From Time value for the range

TimeTo.description: To Time value for the range

sch2_TimeRangeType.description:
Range of times mainly used for inquiry services.
Both time from and to can be specified or only one of them
(depending on the service)

sch2_CreditDebitType.title: sch2_CreditDebitType
sch2_CreditDebitType.description:
This flag indicates if the transaction is a
credit
or debit one. In some cases where the transaction is
suspended or not
yet posted, the value will be U - Undefined

DateLocalAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local date ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in
case date local desc
is specified

DateLocalDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local date descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in
case date local asc
is specified

TimeLocalAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local time ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in
case time local desc
is specified

TimeLocalDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local time descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in
case time local asc
is specified

PostingDateAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by posting date ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in
case posting date desc
is specified

PostingDateDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the posting date descending (newest to oldest). Should be
skipped in
case posting date asc is specified

TransactionAmountAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the transaction amount ascending (smallest to largest). Should
be skipped in
case transaction amount desc
is specified

TransactionAmountDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the transaction amount descending (largest to smallest). Should
be skipped in
case transaction amount asc
is specified

BillingAmountAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the billing amount ascending (smallest to largest). Should
be
skipped in
case billing amount desc
is specified

BillingAmountDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the billing amount descending (largest to smallest). Should
be
skipped in
case billing amount asc
is specified

sch2_PinTypeType.title: sch2_PinTypeType
sch2_PinTypeType.description:
Specifies the type of the pin. As multiple pins
are
supported by Cortex, this will identify the usage of the pin

sch2_ItemCategoryType.title: sch2_ItemCategoryType

allOf.description:
Locale descriptions in case configured for the
item category

sch2_ItemCategoryType.description:
Used to categorize the transaction. The values
are
customer specific

sch2_CreditItemApplicationRuleType.title: sch2_CreditItemApplicationRuleType
sch2_CreditItemApplicationRuleType.description:
Specifies if the transaction was applied on the
due
balance or not due balance of the credit account

Tag.description: Tag for the customer specific user data

User.description:
User name requesting the service. This will be
validated and if not configured or not allowed for this service,
the request will be rejected

Password.description:
Password of the user requesting the service. This
will be validated and if incorrect, the request will be rejected

allOf.description:
Specifies the version of the header used. Current
supported values are 1.0.0. Echoed back in the response header

MsgUid.description:
Unique message ID identifying a specific
message. Echoed back in the response header

Source.description:
Source of the request. Echoed back in the
response header

ServiceId.description:
Service Id of the service being called. Echoed
back in the response header.

ReqDateTime.description:
Request Date and Time echoed back in the
response
in the format yyyy-MM-dd-HH:mm:ss.SSS

Locale.description:
Locale required for the localized response
message. In case not specified, the localized response message
will not be returned in the response. In case specified but
invalid or no localized messages are setup for this locale
message, the default English message will be returned in the
localized response message

allOf.description:
Security holding the user and password of the
requester of the service. Only mandatory in case the security is
enabled for the services

Header user data for customer specific usage.
This field will be echoed back as is in the response if present,
mainly used for fields from the request that might be needed in
the response for the customer's internal usage. No validation is
done on these fields. In some rare cases, these can hold customer
specific tags

Specifies the version of the header used. Current
supported values are 1.0.0. Echoed back from the request header

MsgUid.description:
Unique message ID identifying a specific
message. Echoed back from the request header

Source.description:
Source of the request. Echoed back from the
request header

ServiceId.description:
Service Id of the service called. Echoed back
from the request header

ReqDateTime.description:
Request Date and Time echoed back from the
request

RspDateTime.description:
Response Date and Time in the format
yyyy-MM-dd-HH:mm:ss.SSS

ResponseCode.description:
Response code of the request processing. This
value is unique for each error. A response code of 000 indicates a
successful operation. Any other response code indicates an error.
The value 999 indicates an unknown system error

ResponseType.description:
Indicates the type of the response code.
Supported values are
- Validation Error: Returned when invalid
elements are received in the request
- Business Error: Indicates a
business logic error (i.e. request operation on a card that does
not exist)
- System Error: Indicates a system error (i.e. Database
Error)
- Success: Indicates a successful request

ProcessingTime.description:
Time taken by the web-service to do the
processing and reply in milli seconds

ResponseDescription.description:
Description of the request result and the
response code. Gives additional details about the result of the
operation

allOf.description:
Only returned when a locale is specified in the
request.

List of customer specific response description in
case configured

Header user data for customer specific usage.
This field will be echoed back as is in the response if present,
mainly used for fields from the request that might be needed in
the response for the customer's internal usage. No validation is
done on these fields. In some rare cases, these can hold customer
specific tags

Locale.description:
Locale echoed back from the request regardless if
it was valid or not

LocalizedDescription.description:
Localized description of the response. In case
the locale specified is invalid or the no localized messages are
defined for the locale specified, this will hold the same value as
the ResponseDescription

CustomerSpecificResponseDescription.description: Customer specific descriptions in case configured

Locale.description: Locale for the message returned under this tag

ResponseDescription.description:
Customer specific response description in the
locale specified under this tag

sch7_CcsAccountIdentifierType.title: sch7_CcsAccountIdentifierType

AccountNumber.description: Account Number Identifying a credit account

InstitutionCode.description: Institution Code the account belongs to

allOf.description:
currency of the account. Usually the account
number and institution code
are enough. If specified, the account
is also verified that it has
this currency. The list of supported
ISO currency codes, use the
GetCurrencyList service

sch7_CcsAccountIdentifierType.description:
Identifier for a credit account in cortex in the
credit module. The account number with the institution are enough.
The currency code can be included for additional verification.
Normally when both the credit module and CMS module are installed,
the same account number is used for both

sch8_CardIdentifierType.title: sch8_CardIdentifierType

Pan.description:
Clear or Encrypted Card Number. In case in clear,
cortex will encrypt the PAN before doing any other processing as
all card numbers are encrypted in the database.
External encryption
can be configured in case a different encryption
algorithm than the
cortex core one is used in the communications.
This is
implementation specific.

Vpan.description:
Virtual Card Number generated by Cortex for a
card. It is possible to have the VPAN encrypted using an external
encryption algorithm. This is implementation specific

SequenceNumber.description:
Card Sequence Number. If not specified, defaulted
to 0

ExpiryDate.description:
Card Expiry Date. Use to Identify the plastic on
which the operation is required. In case not specified, the latest
card is assumed to be the requested one

sch8_CardIdentifierType.description:
Identifier for a in cortex. Either PAN or VPAN need
to be specified. The sequence number can be skipped. The card expiry
date can be used to identify which card plastic is required. In case
not specified, the latest card with the specified PAN or VPAN will
be taken into consideration

Pan.description:
Encrypted card number (can be either using cortex
encryption algorithm or an external encryption algorithm
implementation specific)

VPan.description:
Virtual card number generated by cortex for the
card in case configured so. In case configured, it will be
encrypted using an external encryption algorithm

Alpha3.description: Alpha3 ISO code of the country

Alpha2.description: Alpha2 ISO code of the country

DefaultCurrency.description:
Default currency numeric ISO code used int eh
country

allOf.description:
Description of the country in the defined
languages in cortex

ItemId.description:
Unique id identifying the credit transaction in
Cortex

TlogId.description:
Cortex transaction log ID identifying the
financial transaction that generated this credit transaction. Only
available in case the transaction is an actual financial
transaction (Purchase/Cash Withdrawal...). Not available for
payments and adjustments

AccountNumber.description:
Credit account number the transaction was applied
on

allOf.description:
Pan/Card details which was used for the
transaction in case any. Not available in case the transaction
did
not include a card (adjustment, fee...)
Amount of the transaction in the account currency

Amount of the transaction as originally received
with the transaction currency

LocalDate.description: Local date the transaction was made on

TransmissionTime.description: Only available for actual financial transactions

SystemDate.description:
Cortex System Date the credit transaction was
created on

StatementDate.description: Statement date this transaction falls under

TransactionDate.description: Date the transaction was executed on

Description.description:
Description of the transaction (usually used for
the statement)

TransctionCode.description:
Cortex transaction code. Identifies the type of
transaction. Only valid in case the credit transaction is a
financial one. To get the list of supported values, please use the
GetNumericDescription service with description type as 'tx'

TransactionStatus.description:
Identifies the status of the transaction. A
predefined list of values exist of which the below indicate that
the transaction is not suspended (posted or eligible to be
posted):
- 0 - not suspended
- 101 - force posted
To get the list of
supported values and descriptions, please use the
GetNumericDescription service with description type as "ccsist"

FunctionCode.description:
Function code identifying the function of the
transaction providing additional details on the message class
(i.e. original authorization, repeat, address validation...). To
get the
list of supported values, please use the
GetNumericDescription
service with description type 'fncode'

Mcc.description:
Merchant category code of the transaction. Only
available for actual auth/financial transactions. To get the list
of supported values, please use the GetNumericDescription service
with description type as 'ab'

CardAcceptorId.description: Card acceptor id of the transaction

AcquirerCountry.description:
Acquirer country code the transaction took
location in

allOf.description: Country Details

Posted.description:
Specifies if the transaction is posted or still
pending to be posted

Stan.description: System Trace Audit Number in case available

RetreivalReferenceNumber.description:
Retrieval reference number identifying the
transaction from an acquirer

ItemType.description:
Specifies the type of the item/transaction. A
predefined list of values exists and custom items might be
created.
The pre-defined list of supported values is the following:
1= Transaction
2= Card-related fee
3= Card-related commission
4=
Interest
5= Payment
6= Late payment penalty
7= Over limit penalty
8=
Credit adjustment
9= Debit adjustment
10= Account-related fee
11 =
Payment plan credit adjustment. Used to mark the movement of a
item to a payment plan when the plan is initialized
12 = Payment
plan debit adjustment. The corresponding debit to the
item type
‘11’
13 = Due installment (Interest)
14 = Due installment
(principle)
15 = Due installment credit adjustment. This is the
matching credit
to item type ‘14’.
16 = Credit for a cancelled
payment plan. This is a credit to the
not due installment balance
to mark the cancellation of a payment
plan.
17 = Debit for a
cancelled payment plan. This is a debit to a
standard balance
component of the account to mark the cancellation
of a payment
plan. This is the matching debit to item type ‘16’
20=Targeted
payment
To get the full list of item types along with their
description, please use the GetNumericDescription service with the
description type as 'ccsity'

TerminalCode.description:
Terminal code of the transaction. Only available
in case the transaction was done using a terminal

allOf.description:
Specifies if the transaction was applied on the
due balance or not due balance

UserData.description: Customer specific field for the transaction

AuthorizationAccountNumber.description:
First authorization account that the items was
applied.
This field is only applicable to corporate accounts
processing.

allOf.description:
Used to categorize the transaction. The values
are customer specific

ItemSrouce.description:
Identifier label for the source of the item. For
example
'CORTEX'
'HOST'
Either both reference code and source are
specified or neither

ReferenceCode.description:
Reference code for the transaction. This is
unique by source. Either both reference code and source are
specified or neither

allOf.description:
This flag indicates if the transaction is a
credit or debit one. In some cases where the transaction is
suspended or not yet posted, the value will be U - Undefined

Details of the markup in case applied on a
transaction and available

Minimum markup amount defined at the time of the
item application. If the markup percentage calculated is less than
this amount, it is the one used

MarkupPercentage.description: Percentage used to calculate the markup

MarkupAmount.description:
Actual markup amount applied in the account's
currency
